text: Stevenson is a city in the U.S. state of Washington. It is the county seat of Skamania County. It is part of the Portland metropolitan area. The city also lies within the Columbia River Gorge National Scenic Area and is across the river from Cascade Locks, Oregon. The population was 1,491 at the 2020 census. Category:Cities in Washington (state) Category:County seats in Washington (state)
title: Stevenson, Washington
